Class Description
Academy
declaration section // all the GUI components * the whole menu file teacher options course options student options
AddCourse
An instantiable class to add a new course to the file Author: Ivan Segade Carou
AddStudent
An instantiable class which adds a new student to the Student file
AddTeacherView
an instantiable class which adds new teacher to the Teacher file Author: Ivan Segade Carou
AssignStudent
an instantiable class which assigns students to a course Author: Ivan Segade Carou
Course
an instantiable class which defines a course the getters an setters manage the atributes to avoid to corrupt them this class implements Serializable to allow to save the data in a file Author: Ivan Segade Carou
Login  
Person
This is an abstract class which Teacher and Student inherit from.
Student
An instatiable class which defines the student getters and setters are used to manage the atributes this class inherits farou
Teacher
an instantiable class which defines a teacher getters and settrs are used to mange the atributes this class inherits from the Person class
UpdateStudent
an instantiable class which defines the UpdateStudent if updates the information of the student Author: Ivan Segade Carou
UpdateTeacher
an instantiable class which defines the UpdateTeacher class it updates the information of a teacher
Validator
an uninstantiable class which defines the Validator class it just holds methods which are used in more than one class Author: Ivan Segade Carou
ViewCourse
an instantiable class which defines the ViewCourse class it displays all the information about a course Author: Ivan Segade Carou
ViewStudent
an instantiable class which defines the ViewStudent class it displays all the information about a student Author: Ivan Segade Carou
ViewTeacher
an instantiable class which defines the ViewTeacher class it displays all the information about a teacher
